lyrics:

so i think you are a fool

being alone is what you fear
are you lonely
yes lonely

tear me from your heart

loathing exploding controlling
this is what you really are
see korn liveget tickets as low as 69you might also likebridge

the time is coming a bed of flames
your life is over and youre to blame
